title: How to Make Tahaer (Kashmiri Yellow Rice)

steps.headline: Place the rice it the stove.
Add turmeric powder once the water starts boiling.
Boil the rice until it is fully cooked.
Keep checking whether the rice grains are cooked or not.
Cover the cooked rice with a plate or lid.
Drain the water from the rice by holding the plate or lid in place, with the help of a cloth.
Keep the saucepan on the stove.
steps.description: Turn it on to a low heat so that any excess water present in the rice will be evaporated by cooking off. Then remove the plate or lid.

steps.headline: Place a portion of rice in a serving bowl.
Add ghee and salt to taste.
Mix the ghee and salt with the rice with the help of a spatula or a spoon.
Serve the rice as it is.
steps.description: Or serve it with a curd dish or a curry.

text: Cooking the Rice Place the rice it the stove. Bring to the boil. Add turmeric powder once the water starts boiling.  Stir with the spatula.  Boil the rice until it is fully cooked.  Keep checking whether the rice grains are cooked or not.  Draining the Rice Cover the cooked rice with a plate or lid.  Drain the water from the rice by holding the plate or lid in place, with the help of a cloth.  Keep the saucepan on the stove. Turn it on to a low heat so that any excess water present in the rice will be evaporated by cooking off. Then remove the plate or lid. Serving the Rice Place a portion of rice in a serving bowl.  Add ghee and salt to taste.  Mix the ghee and salt with the rice with the help of a spatula or a spoon.  Serve the rice as it is. Or serve it with a curd dish or a curry.
